text: Infanta Sofía of Spain (Sofía de Todos los Santos de Borbón y Ortiz; born 29 April 2007) is the second child of King Felipe VI and Queen Letizia. She was born at Ruber International Hospital in Madrid, She was baptized at Palace of Zarzuela in Madrid. She has an older sister, Leonor, whom she follows in the line of succession to the Spanish throne. She attends UWC Atlantic College and has attended since 2023. This year (2024) she is doing her first ever solo event which is hosting the awards for a photography competition named after herself. ==Titles== * Since 29 April 2007: Her Royal Highness Infanta Sofia of Spain ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the Spanish Monarchy * Family Search Category:2007 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish infantes and infantas Category:People from Madrid Category:Felipe VI
title: Infanta Sofía of Spain
